0.name: ObjectEditorScriptPane

28.comment: A simple box morph. A really blue one. Its amazing what you can build out of simple boxes.... Who needs stars when you got blue rectangles!

526.comment: Edit scripts and connections of a specific morph. Early version.

568.comment: Simple button. Connect to 'fire' to trigger actions when the button is pressed.

886.author: timfelgentreff

890.author: robertkrahn
890.message: restored old version for addressing immediate save problems

892.author: fbo
892.message: No more addScript and better support for Firefox

894.author: robertkrahn
894.message: - Tags text morph now is a input line, fixed a bug in generateSourceForScript()

912.author: bsiegmund
912.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

918.author: lauritz
918.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

922.author: lauritz
922.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

926.author: lauritz
926.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

928.author: lauritz
928.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

930.author: lauritz
930.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

932.author: lauritz
932.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

940.author: lauritz
940.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

942.author: lauritz
942.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

946.author: lauritz
946.message: fixed a defect (weeeeeird property caused an error on deserialization of copies)

948.author: lauritz
948.message: fixed a bug regarding anonymous morphs.

950.author: lauritz
950.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

954.author: lauritz
954.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.

958.author: lauritz
958.message: top-most entry of the tag list is "all" now.

962.message: show scripts even if they are wrapped

964.message: added run button for trying out methods

998.message: Fix for target highlights. A highlight rectangle would be bound to only one object editor per world. Now, each explorer will load and use its own rectangle
